articles.description: Several employees have been interviewed in connection with the investigation by Facebook-parent Meta, the WSJ reported, adding that the probe has been underway since at least last fall.
articles.content: Lawyers are investigating Meta Platforms Inc's outgoing operations chief Sheryl Sandberg's use of company resources over several years, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing people famil… [+1055 chars]

articles.author: Nehal Chaliawala
articles.title: Steel Ministry backs Industry's demand for no Export Duty on existing orders - Economic Times
articles.description: This comes after a new 15% export duty was levied on the export of several key categories of steel to control the inflating prices of the alloy in the domestic market. There was no duty on steel exports earlier.
articles.content: The steel ministry has written to the commerce secretary and the director-general of foreign trade in support of the steel industrys demand that the 15% export duty that became effective from May 22 … [+2581 chars]
